
mar_table Table with Marginal Sums

#### Desription

Adds row and column sums to a two-way table.

#### Usage
<pre><code>

mar_table(x)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments

x a two-way table.
Value
A table with row and column totals added.

Author(s)
David Meyer <David.Meyer@R-project.org>

#### Examples
```{r}

data("SexualFun")
mar_table(SexualFun)
```
